Name: Sunset Residences
Highlights: Luxury beachfront apartments offering stunning views of the Pacific Ocean, with private balconies and floor-to-ceiling windows designed to maximize natural light and scenic vistas.
State-of-the-art fitness center and wellness spa exclusively for residents, featuring modern exercise equipment, yoga studios, sauna, and a rooftop infinity pool overlooking the ocean.
Smart home integration in every unit, allowing residents to control lighting, climate, security, and entertainment systems through voice commands or mobile apps for a seamless living experience.
Eco-friendly design with energy-efficient appliances, solar panels, and a water recycling system, making Sunset Residences a sustainable choice for environmentally conscious residents.

ValueParameters.description: The prime beachfront location in Santa Monica makes Sunset Residences highly desirable, attracting affluent buyers seeking luxury living with ocean views.
The increasing demand for smart home technology in luxury apartments is boosting the market value of properties like Sunset Residences that offer integrated smart home features.
The growing trend toward sustainable living and eco-friendly housing is increasing the value of properties with green design elements and energy-efficient features.

ValueParameters.factor: Expansion of Santa Monica Pier Attractions
ValueParameters.description: The planned expansion of attractions and amenities at Santa Monica Pier is expected to enhance the appeal of the surrounding residential properties, including Sunset Residences.

ValueParameters.factor: Strong Rental Market in Santa Monica
ValueParameters.description: Santa Monica's strong rental market, driven by high demand for luxury beachfront properties, contributes to the property's rental income potential and overall investment value.

Proposals.name: Oceanview Living Inc.
Proposals.description: Oceanview Living Inc. proposes to acquire Sunset Residences to expand their portfolio of luxury beachfront properties and offer premium short-term rentals.

Proposals.name: Seaside Retreats LLC
Proposals.description: Seaside Retreats LLC aims to transform Sunset Residences into an exclusive beachfront resort offering luxury amenities and concierge services.
